description: Deep dive into individual service health with RED method, resource utilization, and dependency analysis

panels.description: Requests per second for the selected service
panels.title: RPS

panels.description: 5xx error percentage for the selected service
panels.title: Error Rate %

panels.description: p95 request latency for the selected service
panels.title: Latency p95

panels.description: Currently active HTTP requests being processed
panels.title: In-Flight Requests

panels.description: HTTP request latency percentiles: p50, p95, p99
panels.title: Latency p50 / p95 / p99

panels.description: RPS over time with error rate overlay
panels.title: RPS over Time (Total / 4xx / 5xx)

panels.description: CPU usage percentage by pod. Uses container_cpu_usage_seconds_total from cAdvisor/kubelet.

targets.expr: 100 * sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="cpu"})

panels.title: CPU Usage %

targets.expr: 100 * sum by (pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", container!="POD"}) / sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory"})

panels.description: Total time spent in garbage collection. High GC pause time indicates memory pressure.
panels.title: GC Pause Time (rate)

panels.description: .NET thread pool queue length — high values indicate thread pool saturation
panels.title: Thread Pool Queue Length (Saturation)

panels.description: Container restart count — frequent restarts indicate instability (OOMKill, CrashLoopBackOff)
panels.title: Pod Restarts (1h)

panels.description: Latency of outgoing HTTP calls (database and external API dependencies) measured by HttpClient instrumentation
panels.title: External Dependency Latency (p50 / p95)

panels.description: Outbox publish duration — proxy for database + message broker write latency
panels.title: Messaging Latency (Outbox Publish / Inbox Consume p95)

panels.description: Processing duration for sub-service reservations (flight, hotel, car)
panels.title: Sub-Service Reservation Processing Duration (p95)
